languages.text: {n}Маражай бросает презрительный взгляд на ведьм и без запинки переходит на низкий готик.{/n} "Этот сброд из ведьминского культа мне не сородичи. Место полуродкам вроде Абесса — здесь, в грязи Прорвы..." {n}Он обрывает сам себя, со скрипом сжимая кулаки в перчатках.{/n}

{n}Marazhai casts a contemptuous glance at the Wyches and without hesitation switches to Low Gothic:{/n} "This Wych Cult scum is not my kin. Half-borns like Aebys belong here in the filth of the Chasm—" {n}He cuts himself off, his gloves squeaking in protest as he clenches his fists.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай бросает презрительный взгляд на ведьм и без запинки переходит на низкий готик.{/n} "Этот сброд из ведьминского культа мне не сородичи. Место полуродкам вроде Абесса — здесь, в грязи Прорвы..." {n}Он обрывает сам себя, со скрипом сжимая кулаки в перчатках.{/n}

Half-borns like Abess belong here in the filth of the Chasm—" {n}He cuts himself off, his gloves squeaking in protest as he clenches his fists.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋轻蔑地瞥了那些巫灵一眼，随后毫不犹豫地以低哥特语开了口。{/n}“巫灵教派的那群渣滓根本不是我的同伴。像阿贝斯这样的支脉，只适合呆在这肮脏的裂隙——”{n}他突然住了口，握紧了双手，手套仿佛抗议一样咯吱作响。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a contemptuous glance at the Wyches and without hesitation switches to Low Gothic:{/n} "This Wych Cult scum is not my kin. Half-borns like Aebys belong here in the filth of the Chasm—" {n}He cuts himself off, his gloves squeaking in protest as he clenches his fists.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋轻蔑地瞥了那些巫灵一眼，随后毫不犹豫地以低哥特语开了口。{/n}“巫灵教派的那群渣滓根本不是我的同伴。像阿贝斯这样的支脉，只适合呆在这肮脏的裂隙——”{n}他突然住了口，握紧了双手，手套仿佛抗议一样咯吱作响。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Après avoir jeté un coup d'œil méprisant aux Cérastes, Marazhai s'adresse à vous en bas gothique :{/n} « Ces vermines ne sont pas mes semblables. La place des demi-sang comme Aebys est ici, dans l'Abîme... » {n}Il s'interrompt en serrant les poings si fort que ses gants grincent en protestation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a contemptuous glance at the Wyches and without hesitation switches to Low Gothic:{/n} "This Wych Cult scum is not my kin. Half-borns like Aebys belong here in the filth of the Chasm—" {n}He cuts himself off, his gloves squeaking in protest as he clenches his fists.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir jeté un coup d'œil méprisant aux Cérastes, Marazhai s'adresse à vous en bas gothique :{/n} « Ces vermines ne sont pas mes semblables. La place des demi-sangs comme Abess est ici, dans l'Abîme... » {n}Il s'interrompt en serrant les poings si fort que ses gants grincent en protestation.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai mira con desprecio a las brujas y sin dudarlo se pasa al Bajo Gótico:{/n} «Esta escoria del Culto de Brujas no es mi gente. Los mestizos como Aebys deberían estar aquí, entre la mugre del Abismo...». {n}Se interrumpe y sus guantes protestan cuando aprieta los puños.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a contemptuous glance at the Wyches and without hesitation switches to Low Gothic:{/n} "This Wych Cult scum is not my kin. Half-borns like Aebys belong here in the filth of the Chasm—" {n}He cuts himself off, his gloves squeaking in protest as he clenches his fists.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai mira con desprecio a las brujas y sin dudarlo se pasa al Bajo Gótico:{/n} «Esta escoria del Culto de Brujas no es mi gente. Los mestizos como Abess deberían estar aquí, entre la mugre del Abismo...». {n}Se interrumpe y sus guantes protestan cuando aprieta los puños.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイはウィッチに軽蔑するような視線を投げかけた後、ためらうことなく下位帝国語に切り替えた。{/n}「この魔女団は俺のキンじゃあない。アベスのようなハーフボーンは、この裂け目の穢れの中の出…」{n}彼は言葉を切ると、手袋がきしむほどの強さで拳を握りしめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a contemptuous glance at the Wyches and without hesitation switches to Low Gothic:{/n} "This Wych Cult scum is not my kin. Half-borns like Aebys belong here in the filth of the Chasm—" {n}He cuts himself off, his gloves squeaking in protest as he clenches his fists.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイはウィッチに軽蔑するような視線を投げかけた後、ためらうことなく下位帝国語に切り替えた。{/n}「この魔女団は俺のキンじゃあない。アベスのようなハーフボーンは、この裂け目の穢れの中の出ーー」{n}彼は言葉を切ると、手袋がきしむほどの強さで拳を握りしめる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai wirft einen verächtlichen Blick auf die Hektari und sagt ohne zu zögern auf Niedergotisch:{/n} "Dieser Abschaum des Hektari-Kultes ist nicht meinesgleichen. Halbgeborene wie Aebys gehören hier zum Abschaum der Kluft ..." {n}Er unterbricht sich und ballt mit knirschenden Handschuhen die Fäuste.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a contemptuous glance at the Wyches and without hesitation switches to Low Gothic:{/n} "This Wych Cult scum is not my kin. Half-borns like Aebys belong here in the filth of the Chasm—" {n}He cuts himself off, his gloves squeaking in protest as he clenches his fists.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai blickt verächtlich zu den Hekatarii und wechselt ohne zu zögern ins Niedergotische:{/n} "Dieser Abschaum vom Hekatarii-Kult ist nicht meine Verwandtschaft. Halbgeborene wie Abess gehören hierher in den Dreck der Kluft -"{n} Er bricht ab, und seine Handschuhe knarzen protestierend, als er die Fäuste ballt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, Viçlere hor gören bir bakış attıktan sonra çekinmeden Adi Gotik dilinde konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Kendimi Viç Tarikatından şerefsizlerle aynı soydan görmüyorum. Aebys gibi yarıdoğanlar, Yarık'ta boklarında boğulsun..." {n}Marazhai lafını yarıda kesip yumruklarını sıkarken, eldivenleri de şikâyet edercesine gıcırdıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casts a contemptuous glance at the Wyches and without hesitation switches to Low Gothic:{/n} "This Wych Cult scum is not my kin. Half-borns like Aebys belong here in the filth of the Chasm—" {n}He cuts himself off, his gloves squeaking in protest as he clenches his fists.{/n}

Aebys gibi yarıdoğanlar, Yarık'ta boklarında boğulsun..." {n}Marazhai lafını yarıda kesip yumruklarını sıkarken, eldivenleri de şikâyet edercesine gıcırdıyor.{/n}
